title: How to Ninja Defuse in Call of Duty

steps.headline: Move in and cover your route to the bomb site.
steps.description: Throw a smoke grenade into an open area that the enemy can so you in.

steps.headline: Find a hiding spot and pull out your pistol.
Investigate your enemy's routes.
steps.description: When an enemy comes up to the bomb site, ask yourself is he really planting the bomb or just getting a scenic view of the beautiful bomb site. If the enemy chooses the scenic view, go back to hiding again.

steps.headline: Wait until enemy does start to plant the bomb.
steps.description: Crouch walk towards the enemy and prone behind him. Make sure you are in knifing distance of the enemy.

steps.headline: Start defusing once the bomb has been planted.
steps.description: Don't stop until the progress bar reaches 100%.

text: Move in and cover your route to the bomb site. Throw a smoke grenade into an open area that the enemy can so you in. Find a hiding spot and pull out your pistol.  Investigate your enemy's routes. When an enemy comes up to the bomb site, ask yourself is he really planting the bomb or just getting a scenic view of the beautiful bomb site. If the enemy chooses the scenic view, go back to hiding again. Wait until enemy does start to plant the bomb. Crouch walk towards the enemy and prone behind him. Make sure you are in knifing distance of the enemy. Start defusing once the bomb has been planted. Don't stop until the progress bar reaches 100%.
